faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.page.hero.title: Help & Support
faq.page.hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about LadderFox. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faq.page.contact.title: Still have questions?
faq.page.contact.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
faq.what_is_ladderfox_answer: LadderFox is a modern, AI-powered career platform that helps you create professional CVs, find matching jobs, and manage your job applications. Simply chat with our AI assistant to build your CV, get personalized career advice, and discover opportunities that match your skills.
faq.is_free_answer: LadderFox offers a free plan with access to basic features including CV creation, templates, and PDF downloads. Premium features like advanced AI analysis, unlimited job matching, and priority support are available with a paid subscription.
faq.how_create_cv: How do I create a CV?
faq.how_create_cv_answer: Creating a CV is easy! Just start a conversation with our AI assistant on the homepage. You can either upload an existing CV/resume, or describe your experience and skills naturally. The AI will extract and structure your information, and you can see your CV update in real-time.
faq.can_download_pdf: Can I download my CV as a PDF?
faq.can_download_pdf_answer: Yes! You can preview and download your CV as a high-quality PDF at any time. The PDF looks exactly like the preview, with professional formatting and styling. You can also choose from multiple templates before downloading.
faq.ats_friendly_answer: Absolutely! All our templates are designed to be ATS (Applicant Tracking System) friendly, ensuring your CV passes automated screenings used by most companies. We use clean formatting, standard section headers, and proper structure.
faq.data_protection_answer: Your privacy is our top priority. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We never share your personal information with third parties. You can delete your account and all associated data at any time from your settings.
faq.can_edit_after_save: Can I edit my CV after saving?
faq.can_edit_after_save_answer: Of course! You can edit, update, and download your CV as many times as you like. Just open your saved CV from the dashboard or sidebar, make changes through the chat, and save again. All your versions are preserved.
faq.contact_support_answer: You can reach our support team via email at info@ladderfox.com. We typically respond within 24 hours. For common questions, check this FAQ page or use the AI assistant which can help with most queries.
faq.languages_supported_answer: LadderFox supports multiple languages including English, Dutch, German, French, and Spanish. The AI can process CVs in any language and help you create content in your preferred language.
faq.mobile_support: Can I use LadderFox on mobile devices?
faq.mobile_support_answer: Yes! LadderFox is fully responsive and works great on smartphones and tablets. You can create, edit, and download your CV from any device with a web browser.
about.title: About LadderFox
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing CV Creation with AI Technology
about.description: LadderFox is a cutting-edge platform that helps professionals create stunning, ATS-optimized CVs using the power of artificial intelligence and evidence-based best practices.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: We believe that everyone deserves to have a professional CV that showcases their skills and experience effectively. Our mission is to democratize professional CV creation, making it accessible to everyone regardless of their design skills or writing abilities.
about.mission.description2: By combining cutting-edge AI technology with evidence-based CV writing principles, we help job seekers create compelling CVs that stand out to recruiters and pass through applicant tracking systems.
about.why_choose.title: Why Choose LadderFox?
about.features.ai_powered.title: AI-Powered CV Creation
about.features.ai_powered.description: Our advanced AI understands your experience and creates professional CVs tailored to your needs.
about.features.smart_suggestions.title: Smart Suggestions
about.features.smart_suggestions.descrip: Get intelligent recommendations for improving your CV based on industry best practices.
about.features.user_friendly.title: User-Friendly Interface
about.features.user_friendly.description: Intuitive design that makes CV creation accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skills.
about.features.secure.title: Secure & Private
about.features.secure.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. Your privacy is our priority.

Let's create a professional CV together! üéØ

To get started, I need some basic information:

**1. Personal Details:**
- What is your full name?
- What is your desired job title?

**2. Work Experience:**
- What is your most recent job title and company?

You can provide me with this information, or if you already have a CV, paste the text below and I'll help you improve it!

---
üí° **Tips:** Use the **Editor** tab to manually adjust text, add a **Photo**, switch **Templates**, or run a free **ATS Check** to optimize your CV for applicant tracking systems.

landing.hero.title: Create a Professional CV in Minutes

landing.founder.story.paragraph1: Hi, I'm the founder behind LadderFox. Like many of you, I've been through the frustrating process of job hunting and CV creation. I remember spending hours trying to format my resume perfectly, only to have it rejected by ATS systems.
landing.founder.story.paragraph2: After helping friends and colleagues with their CVs, I realized there had to be a better way. That's why I built this AI-powered CV builder - to make professional resume creation accessible to everyone.
landing.founder.story.paragraph3: We're currently in private beta, which means you get early access to new features and direct input on what we build next. Your feedback helps shape the future of this tool.
landing.founder.quote: I believe everyone deserves a CV that opens doors. That's why I'm building this tool - to democratize professional resume creation.
landing.founder.author.title: Founder, LadderFox
landing.founder.author.subtitle: Building tools that help people succeed
landing.features.subtitle: From AI-powered content suggestions to professional templates, we've got everything you need to create a standout CV.
landing.features.ai_suggestions.title: AI-Powered Suggestions
landing.features.ai_suggestions.descript: Get intelligent recommendations for content, formatting, and keywords that hiring managers love.
landing.features.pdf_export.title: Instant PDF Export
landing.features.pdf_export.description: Download your professional CV in high-quality PDF format ready for any application.
landing.features.mobile.title: Mobile-Friendly
landing.features.mobile.description: Create and edit your CV on any device with our responsive design.
landing.features.ats.title: ATS-Optimized
landing.features.ats.description: All templates are designed to pass Applicant Tracking Systems and get you noticed.

landing.letter_promo.subtitle: Stand out from the crowd with personalized motivational letters. Our AI helps you craft compelling content that showcases your unique value and passion.

about.how_it_works.title: How It Works
about.how_it_works.step1.title: Share Your Experience
about.how_it_works.step1.description: Chat with our AI assistant about your experience, education, and skills in a natural conversation.
about.how_it_works.step2.title: Real-Time CV Building
about.how_it_works.step2.description: Watch as your professional CV is built in real-time based on your conversation with our AI.
about.how_it_works.step3.title: Customize & Optimize

about.how_it_works.step4.title: Export & Apply

about.values.title: Our Values
about.values.quality.title: Quality
about.values.quality.description: We maintain the highest standards in CV creation, ensuring every document meets professional standards and industry best practices.
about.values.innovation.title: Innovation
about.values.innovation.description: We continuously innovate and improve our platform using the latest AI technology and user feedback.
about.values.accessibility.title: Accessibility
about.values.accessibility.description: We believe professional CV creation should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or technical skills.
cv_guide.title: Essential Tips & Best Practices for Writing an Effective CV
cv_guide.subtitle: Create a strong CV that makes a positive impression on recruiters and passes both human and automated screening. Evidence-based tips, sector-specific advice, and guidance on tailoring your CV to each job application.
cv_guide.general_principles.title: General Principles for a High-Impact CV
cv_guide.general_principles.tailor.title: Tailor Your CV to Each Job
cv_guide.general_principles.tailor.descr: Analyze the job description and use relevant keywords, skills, and experiences that match the employer's requirements.
cv_guide.general_principles.concise.desc: Keep your CV to 1‚Äì2 pages. Use clear headings, bullet points, and a professional layout.
cv_guide.general_principles.profile.desc: Open with a brief, targeted summary that highlights your most relevant skills, experience, and career goals.
cv_guide.general_principles.achievements: Use quantifiable results and specific examples to demonstrate your impact.
cv_guide.general_principles.proofread.de: Spelling, grammar, and formatting errors can undermine your professionalism.
cv_guide.tailoring.title: How to Tailor Your CV to the Job Description
cv_guide.tailoring.step1.title: Analyze the Job Description
cv_guide.tailoring.step1.description: Identify key skills, qualifications, and responsibilities. Highlight these in your CV using the same language as the employer.
cv_guide.tailoring.step2.title: Prioritize Relevant Information
cv_guide.tailoring.step2.description: Place the most relevant experience and skills near the top of your CV. Reorganize sections if necessary.
cv_guide.tailoring.step3.title: Use Keywords and Phrases
cv_guide.tailoring.step3.description: Incorporate keywords from the job description throughout your CV, especially in the summary, skills, and experience sections.
cv_guide.tailoring.step4.title: Showcase Transferable Skills
cv_guide.tailoring.step4.description: Highlight skills such as teamwork, communication, and problem-solving, especially if changing industries.
cv_guide.tailoring.step5.title: Remove Irrelevant Details
cv_guide.tailoring.step5.description: De-emphasize or omit experiences that do not directly relate to the job you're applying for.
cv_guide.recruiters.title: What Recruiters and Employers Look For
cv_guide.recruiters.experience.title: Relevant Experience and Achievements
cv_guide.recruiters.experience.descripti: Recruiters want to see experience that matches the job requirements, with clear evidence of your contributions and results.
cv_guide.recruiters.education.title: Education and Certifications
cv_guide.recruiters.education.descriptio: List relevant degrees, certifications, and training, especially those required or preferred in the job description.
cv_guide.recruiters.detail.title: Attention to Detail and Professionalism
cv_guide.recruiters.detail.description: A well-formatted, error-free CV reflects your professionalism and care.
cv_guide.recruiters.personality.title: Personality and Cultural Fit
cv_guide.recruiters.personality.descript: Employers often look for a personal profile and extracurricular activities to assess your fit with the organization's culture.
cv_guide.sectors.title: Sector-Specific CV Tips
cv_guide.sectors.sales.name: Sales & Marketing
cv_guide.sectors.sales.tips: Quantify sales results, highlight client relationships, include professional photo if relevant
cv_guide.sectors.it.name: IT & Technology
cv_guide.sectors.it.emphasis: Technical skills, certifications, projects, programming languages
cv_guide.sectors.it.tips: List all relevant technologies, detail your role in projects, mention certifications
cv_guide.sectors.healthcare.name: Healthcare
cv_guide.sectors.healthcare.tips: Highlight soft skills, list relevant licenses, emphasize teamwork
cv_guide.sectors.education.name: Education
cv_guide.sectors.education.emphasis: Teaching methods, curriculum development, student engagement
cv_guide.sectors.education.tips: Detail teaching experience, mention extra roles like mentoring, highlight student outcomes
cv_guide.sectors.research.name: Research & Academia
cv_guide.sectors.research.tips: Include publications section, detail research impact, list grants and collaborations
cv_guide.sectors.admin.name: Administration
cv_guide.sectors.admin.emphasis: Organization, accuracy, software proficiency, client contact
cv_guide.sectors.admin.tips: List software skills, highlight organizational achievements, quantify efficiency improvements
cv_guide.sectors.creative.name: Creative & Design
cv_guide.sectors.creative.emphasis: Portfolio, creative projects, software skills, innovation
cv_guide.sectors.creative.tips: Add portfolio link, use visually appealing layout, showcase creative problem-solving
cv_guide.sectors.construction.name: Construction & Engineering
cv_guide.sectors.construction.emphasis: Certifications, safety, technical skills, project experience
cv_guide.sectors.construction.tips: List relevant certifications, describe project roles, emphasize safety record
cv_guide.sectors.hospitality.name: Hospitality & Tourism
cv_guide.sectors.hospitality.emphasis: Customer service, stress management, language skills, flexibility
cv_guide.sectors.hospitality.tips: List languages, highlight customer-facing experience, mention relevant certificates
cv_guide.sectors.nonprofit.name: Non-Profit & Third Sector
cv_guide.sectors.nonprofit.emphasis: Mission alignment, volunteer work, fundraising, teamwork
cv_guide.sectors.nonprofit.tips: Emphasize passion for cause, include volunteer experience, quantify fundraising results
cv_guide.academic_vs_industry.title: Academic CVs vs. Industry CVs
cv_guide.academic_vs_industry.academic.p: Focus on research, publications, teaching, grants, and academic achievements
No strict page limit; structure and detail are more important
Include detailed sections for publications, research projects, and methodologies
Emphasize academic collaborations and institutional affiliations
cv_guide.academic_vs_industry.industry.p: Emphasize practical skills, achievements, and business impact
Keep it concise (1‚Äì2 pages), focus on results
Highlight quantifiable achievements and business outcomes
cv_guide.practical_tips.title: Additional Practical Tips
cv_guide.practical_tips.master_cv.title: Maintain a Master CV
cv_guide.practical_tips.master_cv.descri: Keep a comprehensive document with all your experience and achievements. Customize a version for each application.
cv_guide.practical_tips.format.title: Use Professional Format
cv_guide.practical_tips.format.descripti: Choose a clear, readable font (10‚Äì12 pt), consistent formatting, and sufficient white space.
cv_guide.practical_tips.pdf.title: Save as PDF
cv_guide.practical_tips.pdf.description: This preserves your formatting when sending your CV electronically.
cv_guide.practical_tips.feedback.title: Seek Feedback
cv_guide.practical_tips.feedback.descrip: Ask a career advisor or someone in your field to review your CV for clarity and relevance.
cv_guide.references.title: References to Literature and Research
cv_guide.references.description: This guide is based on evidence-based research from leading universities and career services organizations, including:
cv_guide.references.oxford: Oxford University Careers Service - CV writing best practices
cv_guide.references.harvard: Harvard Business Review - Resume optimization strategies
cv_guide.references.linkedin: LinkedIn Research - What recruiters look for in CVs
cv_guide.references.national: National Careers Service (UK) - CV writing guidelines
cv_guide.references.academic: Academic and industry research on CV effectiveness
cv_guide.cta.title: Ready to create your professional CV?
cv_guide.cta.subtitle: Use our AI-powered CV builder to create a stunning, tailored resume that follows these best practices.
letter_guide.title: Essential Tips & Best Practices for Writing an Effective Motivational Letter
letter_guide.subtitle: Create a compelling motivational letter that makes a positive impression on recruiters and increases your chances of getting invited for an interview. Evidence-based tips, sector-specific advice, and guidance on tailoring your letter to each job application.
letter_guide.general_tips.title: General Tips for a Good Motivational Letter
letter_guide.general_tips.analyze.title: Analyze the Job Description Thoroughly
letter_guide.general_tips.analyze.descri: Look carefully at required competencies, responsibilities, culture, and pay attention to keywords. Use these words and themes in your letter.
letter_guide.general_tips.personalize.de: Tailor each motivational letter specifically to the position and organization. Never reuse the same template without adaptation.
letter_guide.general_tips.support.title: Support Your Motivation with Concrete Examples
letter_guide.general_tips.support.descri: Don't just state that you are suitable, but demonstrate it with performance or situations from previous experiences.
letter_guide.general_tips.personal.title: Make it Personal
letter_guide.general_tips.personal.descr: Share your story briefly, why you specifically fit that organization and position. Be enthusiastic, honest, and authentic in your motivation.
letter_guide.general_tips.concise.title: Write Concisely and Powerfully
letter_guide.general_tips.concise.descri: Maximum one A4 page, with short paragraphs and active sentences. Avoid repetition of your CV and spelling errors.
letter_guide.general_tips.reference.desc: Make clear why this job appeals to you and why you choose this company. Show that you have researched their mission and culture.
letter_guide.general_tips.proofread.desc: Ask for feedback from acquaintances so that your style, language use, and content are sharp.
letter_guide.sectors.title: Tips per Sector/Type Application
letter_guide.sectors.healthcare.name: Healthcare & Social Sector
letter_guide.sectors.healthcare.emphasis: Motivation to help others, empathy, social skills
letter_guide.sectors.healthcare.tips: Emphasize the motivation to help others and your empathetic abilities. Employers strongly focus on social skills and intrinsic motivation.
letter_guide.sectors.healthcare.details: Give examples of involvement, sense of responsibility, and compassion. Show that you want to make a difference in people's lives. Certification and experience are important, but the right motivation is decisive.
letter_guide.sectors.technology.name: Technology & IT
letter_guide.sectors.technology.emphasis: Factual knowledge, technical skills, project experience
letter_guide.sectors.technology.tips: Emphasize factual knowledge and experience, for example with systems, tools, or programming languages.
letter_guide.sectors.technology.details: Describe briefly 1-2 most important relevant projects or performances (no CV repetition). Link these explicitly to the job requirements. Write clearly, directly, and less formally when appropriate. In the technical sector, the motivational letter is often shorter.
letter_guide.sectors.commercial.name: Commercial Professions
letter_guide.sectors.commercial.tips: Focus on ambition, drive, and results orientation: Give examples of achieved targets and successes.
letter_guide.sectors.commercial.details: Use an active, convincing tone. Show that you have commercial insight and think from the customer and organization perspective. Show that you can switch quickly and are energetic, use a creative opening if relevant.
letter_guide.sectors.government.name: Government, Education & Non-Profit
letter_guide.sectors.government.tips: Emphasize social engagement: Explain why the mission of the company or institution appeals to you.
letter_guide.sectors.government.details: Show interest in the (public) impact of the position. Use a formal, careful style. Be authentic and factual; vision and values are important.
letter_guide.sectors.legal.name: Legal
letter_guide.sectors.legal.tips: Focus on experience and analytical ability: Use examples to illustrate how you work efficiently and can distinguish main from minor issues.
letter_guide.sectors.legal.details: Let empathy speak through short personal notes, but keep it businesslike. Mention knowledge of relevant regulations and refer to concrete performances.
letter_guide.analysis.title: Analyzing Job Descriptions: What to Look For
letter_guide.analysis.step1.title: Collect Job Requirements and Wishes
letter_guide.analysis.step1.description: Note all "must haves", "preferences", and striking words from the job description.
letter_guide.analysis.step2.title: Pay Attention to Culture and Mission
letter_guide.analysis.step2.description: Search the company website, LinkedIn, and social media for information about atmosphere, values, and vision. Align your letter accordingly.
letter_guide.analysis.step3.title: Discover Distinguishing Factors
letter_guide.analysis.step3.description: Where can you add unique value in this context? Mention that explicitly.
letter_guide.analysis.step4.title: Ask for More Information if Possible
letter_guide.analysis.step4.description: Call the contact person from the vacancy if possible for more information and refer to this in your letter.
letter_guide.mistakes.title: Common Mistakes to Avoid
letter_guide.mistakes.general.title: Too General or Not Adapted
letter_guide.mistakes.general.descriptio: Generic content that doesn't match the specific job or company requirements.
letter_guide.mistakes.cv_repetition.desc: Simply repeating your CV without adding value or new insights.
letter_guide.mistakes.cliches.title: Clich√©s and Vague Language
letter_guide.mistakes.cliches.descriptio: Using overused phrases, vague wording, and errors in language or formatting.
letter_guide.mistakes.overstating.title: Overstating or Being Too Modest
letter_guide.mistakes.overstating.descri: Stay honest and nuanced - don't exaggerate achievements or undersell yourself.
letter_guide.practical.title: Practical Step-by-Step Plan
letter_guide.practical.step1.title: Start with a Powerful Opening
letter_guide.practical.step1.description: Begin with a strong opening sentence that directly links your motivation or relevance to the position.
letter_guide.practical.step2.title: Introduce Yourself Briefly
letter_guide.practical.step2.description: Tell briefly who you are and what you are good at (fitting the requested competencies).
letter_guide.practical.step3.title: Connect with the Organization
letter_guide.practical.step3.description: Explain the connection with the organization (why this company/this sector).
letter_guide.practical.step4.title: Provide Concrete Examples
letter_guide.practical.step4.description: Mention concrete examples of relevant behavior/performances.
letter_guide.practical.step5.title: Close with Enthusiasm
letter_guide.practical.step5.description: End with enthusiasm and refer to a possible phone call or invitation for an interview.
letter_guide.quick_tips.title: Quick Tips
letter_guide.quick_tips.page_limit: Keep it to one A4 page maximum
letter_guide.cta.title: Ready to Create Your Letter?
letter_guide.cta.subtitle: Use our AI-powered letter builder to create a compelling motivational letter tailored to your specific job application.
letter_guide.resources.title: Additional Resources
letter_guide.resources.cv_guide.title: CV Writing Guide
letter_guide.resources.cv_guide.descript: Learn how to create an effective CV
letter_guide.resources.templates.title: Letter Templates
letter_guide.resources.faq.title: FAQ
letter_builder.title: Motivational Letter Builder
letter_builder.welcome: Welcome to the Motivational Letter Builder! I'll help you create a compelling letter that showcases your qualifications and enthusiasm for the position. Let's start by gathering some information about the recipient and position.
letter_builder.pro_tips.title: Pro Tips:
letter_builder.pro_tips.achievements: Be specific about your achievements and quantify results when possible
letter_builder.pro_tips.research: Research the company and mention specific details about their mission or recent news
letter_builder.pro_tips.enthusiasm: Show enthusiasm for the role and company culture
letter_builder.pro_tips.tone: Keep your tone professional but authentic to your personality
letter_builder.settings.title: Letter Settings
letter_builder.preview.title: Letter Preview
letter_builder.modals.data_permission.de: To provide you with the best possible letter suggestions, we'd like to use your personal data including:
letter_builder.modals.data_permission.bu: Information from your previous CVs and letters
letter_builder.modals.data_permission.pr: This data will be used solely to enhance your letter creation experience and will never be shared with third parties.
letter_builder.messages.generation_succe: Perfect! I've generated your motivational letter. You can now review and edit it in the preview panel.
letter_builder.messages.login_required: Please log in to save your letter
letter_builder.messages.download_require: Please log in to download your letter
letter_builder.messages.permission_grant: Data permission granted! Your information will be used to improve your letter.
letter_builder.messages.generation_error: Failed to generate letter. Please try again.
letter_builder.messages.save_error: Failed to save letter. Please try again.
letter_builder.messages.processing_error: An error occurred while processing your message. Please try again.
letter_builder.messages.response_error: An error occurred while processing your response. Please try again.
letter_builder.questions.welcome: Great! Let's start building your motivational letter. What's the name of the person you're writing to?
letter_builder.questions.recipient_name: Perfect! What's their job title or role?
letter_builder.questions.recipient_title: Excellent! What company are you applying to?
letter_builder.questions.company_name: Great! What position are you applying for?
letter_builder.questions.job_title: Perfect! Now let's get your information. What's your full name?
letter_builder.questions.sender_name: Great! What's your current job title?
letter_builder.questions.sender_phone: Great! When are you planning to submit this application?
letter_builder.questions.application_dat: Perfect! Now let's get to the heart of your letter. Why are you interested in this position? What excites you about this opportunity?
letter_builder.questions.motivation: Excellent! What experience do you have that's most relevant to this role?
letter_builder.questions.relevant_experi: Great! What are your key achievements that relate to this position?
letter_builder.questions.key_achievement: Perfect! How do your skills align with the job requirements?
letter_builder.questions.skills_match: Excellent! What do you know about the company and why do you want to work there?
letter_builder.questions.company_researc: Great! How do you think you would fit into the company culture?
letter_builder.questions.culture_fit: Perfect! What are your career goals and how does this position align with them?
letter_builder.questions.future_goals: Excellent! What unique value would you bring to this role and company?
letter_builder.questions.unique_value: Great! What tone would you like for your letter? (professional, enthusiastic, confident, humble, or assertive)
letter_builder.questions.tone_preference: Perfect! What should be the main focus of your letter? (experience, skills, achievements, culture-fit, or growth)
letter_builder.questions.focus_area: Excellent! How long would you like your letter to be? (concise, standard, or detailed)
letter_builder.questions.letter_length: Perfect! I have all the information I need. Would you like me to generate your motivational letter now?
letter_builder.questions.completion:
üéâ Your motivational letter is ready! You can now:

‚Ä¢ Edit any section using the editor tab
‚Ä¢ Upload job descriptions to enhance the letter
‚Ä¢ Get AI-powered analysis and improvements
‚Ä¢ Download your letter as a PDF
‚Ä¢ Save your letter to your account

What would you like to do next?
letter_builder.questions.default: Thank you for that information! Let's continue building your letter.
letter_builder.new_flow.welcome: Welcome to the Letter Builder! I'll help you create a compelling cover letter. Let's start by getting the job description you're applying for.
letter_builder.new_flow.job_description: Please paste the job description here. This will help me understand the role and create a targeted letter for you.
letter_builder.new_flow.analyze_job: Great! I can analyze this job description to extract key requirements and company information. Would you like me to do this analysis?
letter_builder.new_flow.optimization_are: Perfect! Now let's focus on what areas you'd like me to optimize in your letter. Select all that apply:
letter_builder.new_flow.personal_info: Excellent! Now let's get your personal information to complete the letter.
letter_builder.new_flow.tone_preference: What tone would you like for your letter?
letter_builder.new_flow.letter_length: How long would you like your letter to be?
letter_builder.new_flow.generate_letter: Perfect! I have all the information I need. I'll now generate a personalized cover letter based on the job description and your preferences. This will take a moment...
cv_guide.general_principles.title: General Principles for a High-Impact CV
cv_guide.general_principles.tailor.title: Tailor Your CV to Each Job
cv_guide.general_principles.tailor.descr: Analyze the job description and use relevant keywords, skills, and experiences that match the employer's requirements.
cv_guide.general_principles.concise.desc: Keep your CV to 1‚Äì2 pages. Use clear headings, bullet points, and a professional layout.
cv_guide.general_principles.profile.desc: Open with a brief, targeted summary that highlights your most relevant skills, experience, and career goals.
cv_guide.general_principles.achievements: Use quantifiable results and specific examples to demonstrate your impact.
cv_guide.general_principles.proofread.de: Spelling, grammar, and formatting errors can undermine your professionalism.
cv_guide.tailoring.title: How to Tailor Your CV to the Job Description
cv_guide.tailoring.step1.title: Analyze the Job Description
cv_guide.tailoring.step1.description: Identify key skills, qualifications, and responsibilities. Highlight these in your CV using the same language as the employer.
cv_guide.tailoring.step2.title: Prioritize Relevant Information
cv_guide.tailoring.step2.description: Place the most relevant experience and skills near the top of your CV. Reorganize sections if necessary.
cv_guide.tailoring.step3.title: Use Keywords and Phrases
cv_guide.tailoring.step3.description: Incorporate keywords from the job description throughout your CV, especially in the summary, skills, and experience sections.
cv_guide.tailoring.step4.title: Showcase Transferable Skills
cv_guide.tailoring.step4.description: Highlight skills such as teamwork, communication, and problem-solving, especially if changing industries.
cv_guide.tailoring.step5.title: Remove Irrelevant Details
cv_guide.tailoring.step5.description: De-emphasize or omit experiences that do not directly relate to the job you're applying for.
cv_guide.recruiter_priorities.title: What Recruiters and Employers Look For
cv_guide.recruiter_priorities.experience: Recruiters want to see experience that matches the job requirements, with clear evidence of your contributions and results.
List relevant degrees, certifications, and training, especially those required or preferred in the job description.
cv_guide.recruiter_priorities.detail.des: A well-formatted, error-free CV reflects your professionalism and care.
cv_guide.recruiter_priorities.personalit: Employers often look for a personal profile and extracurricular activities to assess your fit with the organization's culture.
layout.addPhotoInstruction: Type 'add photo' in the chat to add a profile picture

intro.welcome: Welcome to the Advanced CV Builder! I'll help you create a professional CV step by step. Let's start by gathering your basic information.
intro.welcome_with_quick_cv: Welcome to the Advanced CV Builder! I'll help you create a professional CV step by step. For a faster experience, try our Basic CV Builder at /quick-cv
intro.account_data_question: Would you like me to load your account information to pre-fill some CV fields? This includes your name, email, phone, address, and other profile details you've saved in your account settings.
intro.account_data_loaded: Great! I've loaded your account information. Let's start building your CV with your basic details.
intro.starting_fresh: Perfect! Let's start fresh and build your CV from scratch.
question.career_stage: What best describes your current career stage? (This helps me tailor the questions to your experience level)
question.industry_sector: What industry or sector are you targeting? (This helps customize terminology and relevant sections)
question.target_region: Which country/region are you creating this CV for? (This affects format and requirements)
question.pronouns: What pronouns would you like to use? (optional)
question.professional_headline: What's your professional headline or tagline? (A brief, compelling statement about your expertise)
question.career_objective: What type of role are you targeting? (Be specific about your career goals)
question.work_authorization: Are you authorized to work in your target region? (Important for international applications)
question.availability: When can you start a new position? (e.g., 'Immediately', '2 weeks notice', '1 month')
question.website: Do you have a personal website or portfolio? (optional)
question.other_social: Any other social media profiles you'd like to include? (optional)
question.summary_enhanced: Write a 3-4 line professional summary that highlights your experience, key skills, and career goals. Think of this as your elevator pitch.
question.experience_intro_enhanced: Let's add your work experience. I'll guide you through each position step by step.
question.experience_type: Employment type: (Full-time, Part-time, Contract, Internship, Freelance)
question.experience_current: Is this your current position? (This affects how we handle dates)
question.experience_dates_enhanced: When did you start and end this position? (e.g., January 2020 - Present, or specific dates)
question.experience_achievements: Describe 3-5 key achievements in this role. Use numbers and impact where possible (e.g., 'Increased sales by 25%', 'Led team of 10 developers')
question.experience_more: Would you like to add another work experience? (optional)
question.education_intro_enhanced: Now let's add your education. What's your highest level of education?
question.education_dates_enhanced: When did you start and complete this education? (e.g., 2016 - 2020)
question.education_achievements: What were your key achievements? (GPA, honors, relevant coursework, thesis topic) (optional)
question.education_more: Would you like to add another education entry? (optional)
question.skills_intro: Let's organize your skills into categories for better presentation.
question.technical_skills: What are your technical skills? (Programming languages, software, technical competencies)
question.soft_skills: What are your soft skills? (Leadership, communication, problem-solving, teamwork)
question.tools_software: What tools and software are you proficient with? (optional)
question.industry_knowledge: What industry-specific knowledge do you have? (optional)
question.languages_enhanced: What languages do you speak? Include proficiency levels (e.g., 'English - Native', 'Spanish - Fluent', 'French - Intermediate') (optional)
question.certifications_enhanced: Do you have any professional certifications or licenses? Include issuing organization and date (optional)
question.projects_enhanced: Have you worked on any notable projects? Include technologies used and outcomes (optional)
question.volunteer_work: Do you have any volunteer experience? Include organization, role, and impact (optional)
question.awards_recognition: Have you received any awards or recognition? Include organization and year (optional)
question.professional_memberships: Are you a member of any professional associations or organizations? (optional)
question.publications_research: Do you have any publications, research papers, or presentations? Include citations (optional)
question.references: Do you have professional references available upon request? (optional)
question.hobbies_enhanced: List 2-3 hobbies or interests that demonstrate transferable skills or cultural fit (optional)
question.template_preference_enhanced: Do you have a preference for the CV template style? (Modern, Classic, Creative, Minimal) (optional)
question.quality_review: Would you like me to review this section for common mistakes and suggest improvements? (optional)
question.summary_simple: Write a brief professional summary (2-3 sentences) about your experience and career goals:
question.experience_intro_simple: Let's add your work experience. What's your most recent job title?
question.education_intro_simple: What's your highest level of education? (e.g., High School, Bachelor's, Master's, PhD)
question.skills_intro_simple: What are your key skills? (e.g., JavaScript, Project Management, Leadership, Communication)
question.languages_intro_simple: What languages do you speak? (e.g., English, Dutch, Spanish, French)
question.languages_proficiency_simple: Great! Now for each language, please specify your proficiency level. You can use terms like: Native, Fluent, Advanced, Intermediate, Basic, or CEFR levels (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2). For example: 'English: Fluent, Spanish: B2, French: Basic'
quick_cv.excellent_summary: Excellent summary! This will help your CV stand out.
quick_cv.no_problem_education: No problem! Let's move on to your education.
quick_cv.study_diploma_question: Do you have a study/diploma to add? (Yes/No)
quick_cv.no_problem_skills: No problem! Let's move on to your skills.
quick_cv.great_education: Great! Now let's add your education.
quick_cv.great_skills: Great! Now let's add your skills.
completion.success_enhanced: üéâ Excellent! Your professional CV is ready. Here's what you can do next:
completion.basic_success: üéâ Congratulations! Your basic CV is complete and ready for job applications. You now have a professional CV with all essential information. Use the optimization suggestions below to enhance it further or proceed to advanced features.

completion.command.switch: Type 'switch template [name]' to change your CV template
completion.command.photo: Type 'add photo' to include a profile picture
completion.command.download: Type 'download' to save your CV as a PDF

cv_overview.description: Browse professional CV examples by profession. Learn what makes a great CV and get inspired to create your own.
cv_overview.intro_1: A well-crafted CV (Curriculum Vitae) is essential for standing out in today's competitive job market. It serves as your first impression to potential employers and should effectively communicate your skills, experience, and value proposition.
cv_overview.intro_2: Key elements of a strong CV include:
cv_overview.key_1: Clear, professional formatting that is easy to scan
cv_overview.key_2: Relevant work experience with quantifiable achievements
cv_overview.key_3: Skills that match the job requirements
cv_overview.key_4: ATS-friendly keywords for applicant tracking systems
cv_overview.key_5: Concise, impactful descriptions that highlight your value
cv_overview.intro_3: Each profession has unique requirements and expectations. Browse the examples below to see how professionals in your field present their qualifications effectively.

letter_overview.description: Browse professional motivational letter examples by profession. Learn what makes a great cover letter and get inspired to create your own.
letter_overview.intro_1: A compelling motivational letter (cover letter) complements your CV by providing context for your application and demonstrating your genuine interest in the position. It's your opportunity to tell your story and connect with the hiring manager.
letter_overview.intro_2: Key elements of an effective motivational letter include:
letter_overview.key_1: Personalized greeting and opening that captures attention
letter_overview.key_2: Clear connection between your skills and the job requirements
letter_overview.key_3: Specific examples of achievements and experiences
letter_overview.key_4: Demonstration of knowledge about the company and role
letter_overview.key_5: Professional closing with a call to action
letter_overview.intro_3: Different professions require different approaches. Explore the examples below to understand how to tailor your letter for your specific field.
